name: APT1
description: Chinese military unit conducting cyber espionage operations primarily targeting intellectual property and sensitive information from various industries.

name: Lazarus Group
description: North Korean state-sponsored group known for financial cybercrime and destructive attacks, including the Sony Pictures hack and WannaCry ransomware.

name: Fancy Bear
description: Russian military intelligence cyber unit targeting government, military, and security organizations worldwide.

name: Cozy Bear
description: Russian intelligence group conducting long-term espionage operations against government and diplomatic targets.

name: Carbanak
description: Financially motivated group targeting banks, payment processors, and hospitality companies worldwide.

name: Equation Group
description: Highly sophisticated group with advanced zero-day exploits and custom malware frameworks.

name: Turla
description: Russian espionage group targeting government and diplomatic entities with advanced persistent threat techniques.

name: Winnti Group
description: Chinese group conducting both financially motivated attacks and espionage operations.
